headline: What Analysts Think Is Changing The Story For Keurig Dr Pepper (KDP)
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper’s latest research update keeps the fair value estimate anchored around US$34.43 per share, with only very small tweaks to the underlying inputs rather than a fresh call on the stock. That steady headline number sits on quietly shifting ground, as analysts weigh tariff policy on coffee and related categories and debate how much policy relief really supports the current valuation. Read on to see how you can keep on top of these moving pieces so the story around Keurig Dr Pepper...
